charges.charge_description: FRAUDULENTLY AND KNOWINGLY EXPORTED AND CAUSED TO BE SENT FROM THE UNITED STATES, ARTICLES AND OBJECTS, CONTRARY TO THE LAWS AND REGULATONS OF THE UNITED STATES; AND, PRIOR TO THE EXPORTATION, CONCEALED AND FACILITATED THE TRANSPORTATION, AND CONCEALMENT OF SUCH ARTICLES AND OBJECTS, KNOWING THE SAME TO BE INTENDED FOR EXPORTATION CONTRARY TO THE LAWS AND REGULATIONS OF THE UNITED STATES IN VIOLATION OF TITLE 18:554

charges.charge_offence_description: FRAUDULENTLY AND KNOWINGLY EXPORTED AND CAUSED TO

charges.charge_description: 18:924(a)(1)(A)FALSE STATEMENTS TO A FEDERAL FIREARMS LICENSEE(1-2)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 18 MONTHS, CREDIT FOR TIME SERVED; SUPERVISED RELEASE: 36 MONTHS; SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $200.00
